name: Fish Quest 2
description:
Help Fish go to the store and buy soda. Break boxes, bash mean enemies and take their loot!

Controls:

A/D: Walk left and rightW/Space: JumpS: Crouch and go slow
C: Punch!

Fish Quest 2 is a collaborative sequel to the first game I made in Unity. It’s a platformer about a dude called fish who is thirsty and wants to get some soda. This time around he has no money so he has to beat up ghosts and break boxes to acquire money so he can buy soda!

This was made for Ludum Dare 45 which was our first time jam for me and my sister. We had a ton of fun and learned a lot about working together, learned new skills and had really just jammed! Would totally enter a jam again!
